select bb.*, bpc.name category_name, bpb.name brand_name from bs_product bb inner join bs_product_category bpc on bpc.id = bb.category_id inner join bs_product_brand bpb on bpb.id = bb.brand_id
and bb.name like concat('%',#{queryParams.keywords},'%')
and bb.category_id = #{queryParams.categoryId}
ORDER BY bb.id DESC

select bpcb.*, bpc.name category_name, bpb.name brand_name from bs_product_category_brand bpcb inner join bs_product_category bpc on bpc.id = bpcb.category_id inner join bs_product_brand bpb on bpb.id = bpcb.brand_id
and bpc.name like concat('%',#{queryParams.categoryName},'%')
and bpb.menu_id = #{queryParams.brandName}
ORDER BY bpcb.id DESC
